example.eg: He looked at all the horses in turn until he found one he wanted to ride.
example.egtrans: 他依次看了看所有的马，直到找到他想要骑的那一匹。

example.eg: The two of us drank from the bottle in turn until it was empty.
example.egtrans: 我们俩轮流喝瓶中的水，直到把瓶子喝空为止。

example.eg: John gave me the book and I, in turn, gave it to Sandy.
example.egtrans: 约翰把书给了我,我随后又将书给了桑迪。//男孩被欺负了，他随后又去欺负别人。

example.eg: She knew her brother had committed a crime, but she refused to turn him in.
It's getting very late, I'm going to turn in.
Emma lost marks for turning in her homework a day late.
The meteorologists are predicting a bad turn in the weather this weekend.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 天气转坏, 天气变糟糕
